name: Black Simple Wall
description:
You, little black cat. Come back in this wide white room again to find out about your cause of death with your new friend, while you're realizing about how scary world is. 

A visual-novel game with 8-bit/pixel art style that you can interact with objects and continue the story.

----------

Tips:

  • Black Simple Wall is the game that have story continue from White Silly Space so please make sure that you have play the previous game before playing this one so you'll understand about the story  and character's relationship!
  • Black Simple Wall have 2 endings

----------

Before play, this game have:

  • Talking about death, violence
  • Deep conversation 
  • Emotional conversation

----------

* Enjoy and have fun <3
